message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comments must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_FV_SUPPORT_FOR_RECOMMENDATION_LONG
message.locale: Support for Recommendation must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_FV_ASSESSOR_NAME_LONG
message.locale: Assessor Name must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_EDITED
message.locale: This home study is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This home study is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This home study has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: This home study is not '%1c', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_APPROVED_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This home study has already been deleted, it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: This home study has already been approved.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_RETURNED
message.locale: This home study is '%1c', it cannot be rejected.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_RETURNED_OPEN
message.locale: This home study is not '%1c', it cannot be rejected.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_RETURNED_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This home study has already been deleted, it cannot be rejected.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_ALREADY_RETURNED
message.locale: This home study has already been rejected.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: This home study is '%1c', it cannot be submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_ALREADY_SUBMITTED
message.locale: This home study has already been submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_SUBMITTED_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This home study has already been deleted, it cannot be submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The home study Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_PURPOSE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The home study Purpose must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_DATE_INITIATED_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Date Initiated must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_STATUS_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Status must be entered.

message.name: ERR_RETURNED_REASON_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Returned Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ASSESSOR_MANDATORY
message.locale: The Assessor must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_FINAL_RECOMMENDATION_SUPPORT_FOR_RECOMMENDATION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The Support for Recommendation must be entered if Final Recommendation is entered.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_DATE_INITIATED_LATER_THAN_REEVALUATION_DATE
message.locale: The Reevaluation Date, %1d, must be after Date Initiated, %2d.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_DATE_INITIATED_LATER_ASSESSMENT_DATE_COMPLETED
message.locale: Date Initiated must be on or before the Date Completed of the home study assessments, %1d.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_INTERVIEWS
message.locale: Interviews have not been created for this home study, it cannot be submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_ASSESSMENTS
message.locale: Assessments have not been created for this home study, it cannot be submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_NOT_SUBMITTED_NO_FINAL_RECOMMENDATION_OR_SUPPORT_FOR_RECOMMENDATION
message.locale: Final Recommendation and Support For Recommendation must be entered before the home study may be submitted.

message.name: ERR_HOMESTUDY_USER_NOT_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: The user, %1s, must be the supervisor for this provider to perform this task.

message.name: TEXT_HOMESTUDY_HOME_STUDIES_CREATED
message.locale: Created
